tasks.label: commit-merge
tasks.command: git add .gitignore; git add -u; git commit -m "Merge rename-to-flare into B4uti4github-patch-1 and remove tracked Qt files"

tasks.label: cleanup-gitlock
tasks.command: Remove-Item -Force .git\index.lock; git commit -m "Merge rename-to-flare into B4uti4github-patch-1 and remove tracked Qt files"
